header_text: You are at a family gathering. One of your relatives asks you to pass their phone near you to them. Lately, you've been more uncoordinated, and you're worried that your handoff will be clumsy.

elements.text: After thinking about it, you decide to try. You grab the phone and hand it over with...

elements.name: You are at a family gathering. One of your relatives asks you to pass their phone near you to them. Lately, you've been more uncoordinated, and you're worried that your handoff will be clumsy._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
